case_title: United States of America v. Reyes
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Reyes

charges.charge_disposition: 20 MONTHS incarceration to run concurrent with Shelby County Criminal Case No. 19-00177 and to be served consecutive to any other undischarged anticipated sentence to be followed 3 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE. Standard/Mandatory conditions of supervised release. Additional conditions: search provision; drug testing &; treatment; mental health &; testing and treatment; vocational training; MRT; and DNA collection. Special assessment: $100.00. The Court Recommends to the BOP: to be incarcerated as close to Memphis as possible to be near family; RDAP or any other drug abuse program defendant qualifies for.
